title: User Authentication and Security Framework
summary: Implement secure user authentication with multi-factor support
description: Develop a robust authentication framework that allows customers to securely log in using multi-factor authentication, ensuring data protection and compliance with banking security standards. This includes support for password policies, OTP delivery channels, session management, and encryption of sensitive credentials.

title: Responsive User Interface and Experience Design
summary: Design and develop a responsive and user-friendly portal interface
description: Create a modern, responsive user interface that adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The design should focus on simplicity, ease of navigation, accessibility, and consistency in look and feel across platforms, ensuring an optimal experience for customers accessing the portal.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Customer Profile Management
summary: Build a dynamic dashboard showcasing relevant banking products and services
description: Develop a personalized dashboard that displays the user's account information, product eligibility, and recommended banking services based on customer profiles. The dashboard should adapt dynamically to reflect real-time data and provide intuitive access to commonly used features.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable streamlined digital account opening and service modification processes
description: Implement digital workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services online. The process should require minimal clicks, automate form filling using stored data, and provide clear step-by-step guidance throughout the application journey.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time updates and notifications for customer requests
description: Introduce a system for customers to track the real-time status of their account opening or service requests. Integrate automated email notifications and portal alerts to keep users informed at key process stages, enhancing transparency and customer engagement.

title: Document Upload and Management
summary: Allow secure document submission for service requests and applications
description: Develop an integrated document management feature enabling customers to upload, preview, and manage required documentation directly via the portal. Ensure secure file transmission and storage, conforming to data protection and compliance standards.

title: Save and Resume Application Feature
summary: Enable customers to pause and continue incomplete processes
description: Create functionality that allows users to save partially completed account opening or service request forms and resume them later without data loss. This feature should securely store draft data and ensure that the user's progress is easily recoverable upon next login.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with existing core banking systems
description: Develop a robust integration layer with the bank's existing core banking infrastructure to ensure seamless data synchronization. The integration should handle data exchange for account management, transaction details, and service requests, ensuring high availability and real-time data accuracy.

title: Customer Interaction History and Reporting
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all customer activities and interactions
description: Implement a comprehensive history module to log and display all user interactions, applications, and service requests. The portal should allow customers to review their historical actions while enabling support and audit teams to analyze activity patterns to improve services.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
summary: Ensure appropriate access to portal features based on user roles
description: Design and implement a robust role-based access control mechanism that restricts visibility and access to features based on the customer’s profile and authorization level. This ensures regulatory compliance and tailored user experience aligned with the customer's role and entitlements.

title: System Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop a separate, optimized database for portal performance and reliability
description: Create an independent database architecture dedicated to the portal’s performance, ensuring responsiveness and scalability. Introduce data caching, indexing, and maintenance policies to optimize system reliability and minimize load on the core banking system.
